title: Knowledge Based Systems
ziele: The lecture provides a survey of Knowledge Based Systems and gives students a chance to learn and practice techniques and programming languages for that domain such as Prolog and Datalog.
lehrinhalte: Survey of Knowledge Based Systems, Rule Based Systems, Prolog, Datalog, Case Based Reasoning
beurteilung: Written exam at the end of the semester (66%), Quality of Implementation Project (34%)
literatur:
Pdf versions of the powerpoint slides used in the lecture will be made available via KUSSS.
Recommended reading (will not be needed if the lectures are attended on a regular basis): Ch. Beierle, G. Kern-Isberner. Methoden Wissensbasierter Systeme; R.Akerkar, P.Sajja. Knowledge-Based Systems; W.F. Clocksin, Ch.S. Mellish. Programming in Prolog
